TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HtmlContainerControl extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl
Public MustInherit Class HtmlContainerControl Inherits HtmlControl

summary.span: 作为映射到需具有开始和结束标记的 HTML 元素的 HTML 服务器控件的抽象基类。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for HTML server controls that map to HTML elements that are required to have an opening and a closing tag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 具有结束标记的最常见控件是 `
`、``、``、`
`、``和 `` 元素。The most common controls with a closing tag are the ``, ``, ``, `
`, ``, and `` elements. 和 属性允许您操作 派生控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的内容。The and properties allow you to manipulate the content between the opening and closing tags of -derived controls. 有关 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 不会直接创建此类的新实例。A new instance of this class is not created directly. > [!CAUTION] > 如果使用 属性指定 HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本，则不会对文本进行 HTML 编码。If you use the property to specify the text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control, the text is not HTML encoded. 这样就可以在文本的 HTML 标记中嵌入脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 使用 属性时，请确保验证值以减少安全漏洞。When using the property, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities. 否则，请考虑改用 属性。Otherwise, consider using the property instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类的 属性在网页上动态生成消息。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of this class to dynamically generate a message on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化使用默认值的 类的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using default values. > [!NOTE] > 不会直接创建此类的实例。An instance of this class is not created directly. 此构造函数是从其他 HTML 控件类的构造函数调用的，用于初始化此类中定义的属性。This constructor is called from the constructor of other HTML control classes to initialize properties defined in this class. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Span" 文本字符串。The "span" literal string.|

summary.span: 获取或设置位于指定 HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content found between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.

value.span: HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的 HTML 内容。

span.span: The HTML content between opening and closing tags of an HTML server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性以编程方式修改 HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的内容。Use the property to programmatically modify the contents between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control. 属性不会自动在 HTML 实体中对特殊字符进行编码。The property does not automatically encode special characters to and from HTML entities. 您可以使用 HTML 实体来显示特殊字符（例如 `<` 字符），浏览器通常会将其解释为具有特殊意义。HTML entities allow you to display special characters, such as the `<` character, that a browser would ordinarily interpret as having special meaning. `<` 字符将被解释为标记的开头，并且不会显示在该页上。The `<` character would be interpreted as the start of a tag and is not displayed on the page. 若要显示 `<` 字符，需要使用实体 `<`。To display the `<` character, you would need to use the entity `<`. 例如，如果将 属性设置为 `" Hello "`，则 `<` 和 `>` 字符将不会分别转换为 `<` 和 `>`。For example, if the property is set to `" Hello "`, the `<` and `>` characters are not converted to `<` and `>`, respectively. 呈现的输出仍为： \ Hello \。The rendered output would still be: \ Hello \. 浏览器将检测 `` 标记，并以粗体字显示文本 "Hello"。The browser will detect the `` tags and display the text, Hello, in a bold font. > [!CAUTION] > 由于文本不是 HTML 编码的，因此可以在文本的 HTML 标记中嵌入脚本。Because the text is not HTML encoded, it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果使用用户输入动态设置此属性，请确保验证该值以减少安全漏洞。If this property is set dynamically using user input, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性和用户输入](/dotnet/standard/security/security-and-user-input)。For more information, see [Security and User Input](/dotnet/standard/security/security-and-user-input). 若要提供自动 HTML 编码和解码，请使用 属性。To provide automatic HTML encoding and decoding, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有子控件，则 属性包含 值。If there are no child controls, the property contains the value . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性动态设置短信。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to dynamically set a text message. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

-or-

summary.span: 获取或设置位于指定 HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.

value.span: HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本。

span.span: The text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性以编程方式修改 HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本。Use the property to programmatically modify the text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control. 与 属性不同， 属性会自动对 HTML 实体之间的特殊字符进行编码。Unlike the property, the property automatically encodes special characters to and from HTML entities. 您可以使用 HTML 实体来显示特殊字符（例如 `<` 字符），浏览器通常会将其解释为具有特殊意义。HTML entities allow you to display special characters, such as the `<` character, that a browser would ordinarily interpret as having special meaning. `<` 字符将被解释为标记的开头，并且不会显示在该页上。The `<` character would be interpreted as the start of a tag and is not displayed on the page. 若要显示 `<` 字符，需要使用实体 `<`。To display the `<` character, you would need to use the entity `<`. 例如，如果 属性设置为 `" Hello "`，则 `<` 和 `>` 符号分别转换为 `<` 和 `>`。For example, if the property is set to `" Hello "`, the `<` and `>` symbols are converted to `<` and `>`, respectively. 呈现的输出为： < b > Hello </b >。The rendered output would be: < b > Hello < /b >. `<` 和 `>` 实体将向浏览器指示这些字符将在页面上显示。The `<` and `>` entities would indicate to the browser that these characters are to be displayed on the page. 浏览器将不会检测 `` 标记，并以粗体字显示文本。The browser will not detect the `` tags and display the text in a bold font. 页面上显示的文本为： \ Hello \。The text displayed on the page is: \ Hello \. 若要防止自动进行 HTML 编码和解码，请使用 属性。To prevent automatic HTML encoding and decoding, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有子控件，则 属性包含 值。If there are no child controls, the property contains the value . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示通过 属性提供的 HTML 编码服务。The following code example demonstrates the HTML encoding service available through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从前一个由 方法保存的页请求还原 控件的视图状态。

span.span: Restores the control's view state from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法调用基类的 方法。The method calls the base class's method. 此外， 方法设置 属性。In addition, the method sets the property.

summary.span: 将 控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将重写 方法以呈现 控件的开始标记、子控件和结束标记。The method overrides the method to render the opening tag, child controls, and closing tag of the control. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 方法时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便正确呈现 控件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is correctly rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 方法来呈现 控件的结束标记。The method is called by the method to render the closing tag of the control. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.
